---
name: Connector Request
about: Request a new connector for a system or service
labels: connector-request
---

## System / Service

Name and description of the system to connect to.

## Use Case

How would this connector be used?

## Polling or Webhook

Does this system support webhooks, polling, or both?

## Existing SDK / API

Links to any official SDK, API docs, or client libraries.

## Additional Context

Any other relevant details.
